title: I tried Xayah on pbe, shes cool as hell but...
body:
Its really sad on how many adcs will be irrelevant once shes released.

Her wave clear is simply unmatched in the adc role (except maybe jinx, but jinx is shit right now), she has high base damages, twitch ult as a passive, no damage cap or reduction on E and it scales with crit, untargetability on ult, with her current numbers she'll be strong at every phase of the game.

Like why would i ever play something like jinx/tristana/twitch over this champion?

She feels great to play and she can do a lot to kite or even outplay ppl diving her, but riot needs to bring the weaker adcs back into the game, about half of the adc pool (the bottom half) feels like im playing close to no agency champs that need a whole team to even begin to function and have too many weaknesses for too little or niche strenghts.

replies.body: I'm prepared to see yet another champion nerfed into Oblivion.
This is definitely what's gonna happen. League of Powercreep.

She's supposed to be a marksman that's strong on *defense*, weak on offense, hence the traps and the dodge.

She's supposed to be weak at asserting herself, but strong at defending herself. She may be broken at launch, but keep that in mind going forward so you're mad at the right things.

> [{quoted}](name=chipndip1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1HyqAzEE,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-04-08T03:34:10.203+0000)
>
> She's supposed to be a marksman that's strong on *defense*, weak on offense, hence the traps and the dodge.
> 
> She's supposed to be weak at asserting herself, but strong at defending herself. She may be broken at launch, but keep that in mind going forward so you're mad at the right things.

She doesnt seem weak of offense, the only weak thing is her E when chasing someone running away, but even then redbuff exists and you can just 3 fether to just root someone to stay in range, she has very good aoe damage regardless with passive + w.

Im not exactly mad about the new champ, im mad about riot thinking kits like her and tristana belong in the same game.

Like why not make the other adcs feel good to play too then?

Difference between the two is that Tristana's not well designed, but Xayah is. Xayah's more focused into controlling set space around her and defending herself in that way. Half of Trist's self peel is also a massive offense boon if she gets resets, making her just generally powerful, and thus Riot guts her if she ever gets powerful (especially since she as an extremely low margin of error due to having no skill shots).

Then again, this is an issue I have with a lot of older champs. Older designs don't hold up with the game's current vision and direction, but people BEG to keep them around. Tristana's rework gave her one new move and new visuals. It wasn't enough to really fix the character. Same with Sona. Same with Kayle. Same with Garen. So on and so forth, and yet I can't convince anyone that this is a pattern that keeps happening.
She's probably going to be cancer yeah. When I saw her no-sell Zed's ult my eyes bulged out of their fucking sockets. A mechanic like that has no place on an ADC.

Its like they dont play their own game.

It's not noted in the tooltip, but each feather is reduced in damage down to 10%.
